readable.title: 247097023_e656d5854d
readable.content: A man in a dark shirt and shorts is standing on top of a high graffitied rock . A man in black standing on a rock with the phrase " life is short " spray painted on it . A man is standing on rocks , which are inscribed with the phrase , " life is short " on the side . A man stands on a rock and takes in the view . A man wearing a black shirt is standing on top of a rock that says , " life is short " .
